meanings.definition: To cause a satellite or spacecraft to descend from orbit.
meanings.sent1: The astronauts will deorbit the satellite tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The engineers deorbit the spacecraft safely.
meanings.sent3: The satellite decided to deorbit for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: The spacecraft's journey was like a dance as it deorbited gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The mission required precise timing to deorbit successfully.

meanings.definition: The act of descending from orbit.
meanings.sent1: The deorbit of the satellite was smooth.
meanings.sent2: We observed the deorbit of the spacecraft from the ground.
meanings.sent3: The deorbit of the satellite caused a stir among astronomers.
meanings.sent4: The deorbit of the spacecraft symbolized the end of its mission.
meanings.sent5: The deorbit of the satellite left a lasting impression on the team.
